name: UNFAIRWAY
description:
Unfairway is mini-golf with a twist! Every round one player controls the hole! Set yourself up for success or  make it harder for everyone else, you decide!

Controls: 

Look / Aim: Mouse

Putt: Hold left click and release at desired power

Menu & Score:  Spacebar

Credits: 

Jason Peterson : Project Manager / Lead Programmer / 3D modeler
Dan Weber : Secondary Programmer 
Nolan Sadowski : UI (and music soon!)
Music & Sound FX: Prosound Collection & Universal Sound FX
Player Number UI: GameDev Market
